name: The Lost City (itch)
description:
Instructions:

WASD - Move
F - Interact with objects and NPCs
Mouse Left-Button - Move camera, Press button

This is a personal expression and meditation on the past year (2020-2021)—of the time and space that was lost, and the feelings of hope for the future.

This environment was created to explore those emotions, as well as to develop skills in Unity 3D.

Made By: Eva Yan | LinkedIn | Github | Portfolio | Art Portfolio
For: XR Design & Development, Spring 2021 (April - May)
